attributes.action: Help All CANCER SUFFERS; Use National Lottery Good Causes Monies for Cancer Care & STOP Post Code Lottery Medication
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cancer touches everyone in the UK at sometime in there life.
So Why-not Use National Lottery Good Causes Monies for Cancer Care; New machines & scanners; STOP Post Code Lottery Medication give people the right to life & dignity.  The NHS can't help with funding shortages so use the peoples monies The National Lottery; help to save so many lives; the people of the UK would play the Lottery far more knowing funding of Lottery was going to help save so many lives & families; cancer suffers should not have to die because of lack of funding; also this money could help finding cures for Breast Cancer, Prostate Cancer, Bowel Cancer and more..The GAMES or CANCER you decide its your money...Help Cancer Patients DON'T LET THEM DIE. OTHER COUNTIES HAVE GOT THERE PRIORITIES RIGHT, NEED I SAY MORE
